content: मैत्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (त्री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [मित्र-अण्] {@--1@} Belonging to a friend. {@--2@} Given by a friend. {@--3@} Friendly, well-disposed, amicable, kind; <ls>Ms. 2. 87</ls>; <ls>Bg. 12. 13.</ls> {@--4@} Relating to the god Mitra (as a Muhūrta); <ls>Ku. 7. 6.</ls> --त्रः {@--1@} A high or perfect Brāhmaṇa. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a particular mixed tribe; <ls>Ms. 10. 23.</ls> {@--3@} The anus. {@--4@} A friend. --त्री {@--1@} Friendship, good will. {@--2@} Intimate connection or association, union, contact; प्रत्यूषेषु स्फुटितकतलामोदमैत्रीकषायः <ls>Me. 31.</ls> {@--3@} The lupar mansion called अनुराधा. --त्रं {@--1@} Friendship. {@--2@} Voiding or evacuation of excrement; <ls>Ms. 4. 152.</ls> {@--3@} A prayer addressed to Mitra. {@--4@} The lunar mansion अनुराधा (मैत्रभं) in the same sense.
